scenes.label: *start
texts: ポロン
Momo! Here!
I got off the graper and went straight to Room 201.
I was low on time, so I had to ignore the info Wind sent me.
ポロン
Cross! Now you've found the repeater, you got nothing to do, right? Help me out, bro.
クロス
I'm listening.
ポロン
I need to get the flight path data from the BMI of the hack's source. Will you help me if I set up a backdoor?
クロス
I'll just ask: there's no other way, is there?
ポロン
That's what you told me last time.
クロス
Guess I gotta trust it, then.
I connected to the electronic lock and unlocked it.
There was no point improving the security, so I just went straight inside.
ポロン
Lime Nukui! You gotta help us!
ライム
AAGHHH!
ポロン
Calm down and look at this.
I did what Momo had before, and showed Lime an AR image of the news.
Just like last time, the news showed a banking Flight 302, which straightened out once Lime righted the plane in the simulator.
ライム
I'm just playing Garuda, man...
ポロン
I know. We'll take care of this. You just keep on flying.
I established a wired connection to Lime's carrianode and began setting up the backdoor.
That was when I heard police sirens in the distance.
